scripts.build: npm i -g bun && bun i && antlr4ng -o ./lib -Dlanguage=JavaScript -visitor -listener *.g4 && babel ./lib --out-dir ./lib --plugins=@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs
scripts.publish: git tag -a "$TAG" -m "Release $TAG" && zip -r "fplus-$TAG.zip" ./dist/* && gh release create "$TAG" --title "Release $TAG" --notes "" -R https://github.com/FreshPenguin112/fplus fplus-"$TAG".zip && rm fplus-"$TAG".zip
